tools.descartes.bungee.cloud.aws.ecs.management

Class AwsEcsManagement

  • java.lang.Object
    • tools.descartes.bungee.cloud.aws.ecs.management.AwsEcsManagement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    tools.descartes.bungee.cloud.CloudInfo, tools.descartes.bungee.cloud.CloudManagement

    public class AwsEcsManagement
extends java.lang.Object
implements tools.descartes.bungee.cloud.CloudInfo, tools.descartes.bungee.cloud.CloudManagement
    Enables the benchmark to get and set the desired task count in AWS ECS and get the number of tasks currently running.
    Author:
    nora
